title: RP IP
body: are the PBE players gonna get Rp and IP. and when

replies.body: New testers are given a large portion to help with testing when accessing the PBE for the first time.  It can take some time to process per the [PBE Faq](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  Relogging or playing a game can also help force that update.  Hope that helps!

i'm already playing for 3-4 days and still didn't got it 
i only got 2 purple chest

I wasn't able to locate a PB account tied to the account you're posting from.  Assuming that you are referring to the PBE and not alpha client test (which is on the live server), your best bet is to wait for your account to update.  If the issue persists, though, let the PBE team know on the [PBE boards](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/).  Good luck!
